U-Shape Profile Definition
==========================



```
concept {
    IfcUShapeProfileDef:ProfileType -> IfcProfileTypeEnum
    IfcUShapeProfileDef:ProfileName -> IfcLabel
    IfcUShapeProfileDef:Position -> IfcAxis2Placement2D_0
    IfcUShapeProfileDef:Position -> IfcAxis2Placement2D_1
    IfcUShapeProfileDef:Depth -> IfcPositiveLengthMeasure_0
    IfcUShapeProfileDef:FlangeWidth -> IfcPositiveLengthMeasure_1
    IfcUShapeProfileDef:WebThickness -> IfcPositiveLengthMeasure_2
    IfcUShapeProfileDef:FlangeThickness -> IfcPositiveLengthMeasure_3
    IfcUShapeProfileDef:FilletRadius -> IfcNonNegativeLengthMeasure_0
    IfcUShapeProfileDef:EdgeRadius -> IfcNonNegativeLengthMeasure_1
    IfcUShapeProfileDef:FlangeSlope -> IfcPlaneAngleMeasure
    IfcAxis2Placement2D_0:Location -> IfcCartesianPoint_0
    IfcAxis2Placement2D_0:Location -> IfcCartesianPoint_1
    IfcAxis2Placement2D_0:RefDirection -> IfcDirection_0
    IfcAxis2Placement2D_0:RefDirection -> IfcDirection_1
}
```
